meanings.definition: A source of terror or dread.
meanings.sent1: The specter of war loomed over the peaceful village.
meanings.sent2: The unknown creature in the dark alley was a specter of fear.
meanings.sent3: The looming deadline was a specter that haunted his dreams.
meanings.sent4: The specter of failure cast a shadow over her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The specter of the haunted forest kept travelers away at night.

meanings.sent4: The specter of poverty haunted the city streets.
